original_text: A person's own mind deceives him, more than anything else does. Nobody can change it to be better. Nobody completely understands it. A person's own mind deceives him,
korean_text: 만물보다 거짓되고 심히 부패한 것은 마음이라 누가 능히 이를 알리요마는

sentences.original_text: A person's own mind deceives him
Nobody can change it to be better
sentences.korean_translation: 누구도 그것을 더 좋게 바꿀 수 없고

sentences.original_text: A person's own mind deceives him
